content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- Selecionando todos os dados da pasta
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- Selecionando todos os dados das sub-pastas
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- Selecionando dados de meses específicos
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- Mútiplos caracteres curinga
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

-- Função filename() metadata
SELECT
    TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER BY result.filename();

-- Limitando os dados do filename()
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY result.filename()
ORDER BY result.filename();

-- Função filepath() metadata
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);

-- Usando o WHERE na função filepath() metadata
SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyt_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]

WHERE result.filepath(1) = '2020'
  AND result.filepath(2) IN ('06','07', '08')
GROUP BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY result.filename(), result.filepath(1), result.filepath(2);
